item.title: Vic add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "We will always remember. We will always be proud. We will always be prepared, so we will always be free." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Vic add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "Above all, we must realize that no arsenal, or no weapon in the arsenals of the world, is so formidable as the will and moral courage of free men and women." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Vic add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "God is a comedian playing to an audience that is too afraid to laugh." -- Voltaire

item.title: Vic add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Common sense is not so common." -- Voltaire

item.title: Vic add a quote by Voltaire
Vic add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Ice-cream is exquisite. What a pity it isn't illegal." -- Voltaire

item.title: Vic add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "A subject for a great poet would be God's boredom after the seventh day of creation." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Vic add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "We in America do not have government by the majority. We have government by the majority who participate." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Vic add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description:
"Here was buried Thomas Jefferson, author of the Declaration of American Independence, of the Statute of Virginia for Religious Freedom, and Father of the University of Virginia.
[<i>Epitaph, upon his instructions to erect a 'a plain die or cube ... surmounted by an Obelisk' with 'the following inscription, and not a word moreâ€¦because by these, as testimonials that I have lived, I wish most to be remembered.' It omits that he had been President of the United States, a position of political power and prestige, and celebrates his involvement in the creation of the means of inspiration and instruction by which many human lives have been liberated from oppression and ignorance</i>]" -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Vic add a quote by John Philpot Curran
item.description: "The price of freedom is eternal vigilance." -- John Philpot Curran

item.title: Vic add a quote by Barry Goldwater
item.description: "A government big enough to give you everything you want is big enough to take everything you have." -- Barry Goldwater

item.title: Vic add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Vic add a quote by Anthony G. Oettinger
item.description: "Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana." -- Anthony G. Oettinger

item.title: Vic add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Humor is reason gone mad." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Vic add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I've had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Vic add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Those are my principles, and if you don't like them...well I have others." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Vic add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies." -- Groucho Marx
